pr_title: chore: set the default copyright header to something shorter

timeline.message:
chore: set the default copyright header to something shorter

Apache says this is a "shorter variant you may use."

https://www.apache.org/foundation/license-faq.html#Apply-My-Software

this PR makes no attempt to change _all_ the existing copyright headers, but does do a few of the high-level files to set an example.

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to go for "The Terasology Foundation" instead of "Moving Blocks"? @Cervator ?
timeline.author: skaldarnar

replies.bodyText:
Yes please - good catch 👍
That's been a global change far down the todo list for a while now
